Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: he mere putaro! Ja'u, yusapha ate usa de bhara di talasa karom ate alaha di di'alata tom' nirasa na hovo. Alaha di rahimata tom sirafa usa de inakari hi nirasa hude hana

Phira jadom uha yusapha de kaula pahuce tam unham ne kiha he aziza! (Raja) sanu ate sade ghara vali'am nu bahuta dukha pahuca riha hai ate asim bhorhi puji lai ke a'e ham. Tusim sanu pura anaja de devo ate sanu dana vi devo. Besaka alaha dana karana vali'am nu usa da fala dida hai
Unham ne kiha ki tuhanu pata hai ki tusim yusapha ate usa de bhara de nala ki kita jadom tuhanu samajha nahim si

Unham ne kiha, ki asala vica tusim him yusapha ho. Usa ne kiha ham, mai yusapha ham ate iha mora bhara hai. Alaha ne sade uparakha kirapa kiti. Jihara sada alaha tom darada ate dhiraja rakhada hai tam alaha neka karama karana vali'am da fala khatama nahim karada
Bharavam ne kiha, alaha di kasama alaha ne tuhanu sade upara utamata bakhasi hai. Ko'i saka nahim asim hi mare raha upara si
Yusapha ne kiha, aja tuhade upara ko'i dosa nahim. Alaha tuhanu mu'afa kare, uha sabha kirapalu'am tom vada kirapalu hai
Tusim mera iha kurata lai ja'u ate isa nu mere pita de muha upara phera di'u usa di rausani vapisa a javegi ate tusim apane ghara vali'am nala mere kola a ja'u

Ate jadom bha'i'am da kaphala misara tom vapisa cali'a tam usa de pita ne kinana vica kiha ki jekara tusim' mainu budhape vica jhali'am galam karana vala na samajho tam mai' yusapha di khusabu pa riha ham
Lokam ne kiha, alaha di sahu, apa tam aje taka apane purane bharamam vica duthe ho
